EmailTemplate.name: ERM event host content approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Session "{!Session__c.Name}" ready for review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Colleague,
The presentation of "{!Session__c.Name}" is ready for review for {!Session__c.Event__c}. Click the following link to access the presentation.
NOTE: Only the Event Host can approve a presentation.
Click here to see how to approve or reject a presentation in sCRM.
Thank you,
